name: Tic-Tac-Toe (FieryGames)
description:
*HOW TO DOWNLOAD: 

1. Hit The Download Button and Download The .zip File To Your PC/Laptop. 

2.Right Click On The .zip File and Click Extract All. 

3.Run The .exe File And Drag To Desktop To Create A Shortcut. *

Hey Guys, this is my second commercial game and in this one you have to tap on the boxes to play tic tac toe and it says whose turn it is in the corner, it is a 2 player game but in a while I will add an AI player (computer plays). If you want to restart it has a button in the corner and is a fun game that you can play when you're bored etc. or if you just wanna play it. Have Fun :)        Made By: Fiery Games.
